_header: On a birchen bank there boughs arn bright
_description: ‘De tribus regibus mortuis’, a vision poem — eleven 13-line alliterative stanzas (ababababcdccd)

BodDou302.First Lines:
An a byrchyn bonke þer bous arne bryȝtI saw a brymlyche
                    bore to a bay broȝt…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…To lyte will leue þis allasOure lord delyuer vs from
                    losse
